query.ejb-ql: SELECT DISTINCT l.order FROM LineItem l
SELECT OBJECT(p) FROM Product p ORDER BY p.name
SELECT DISTINCT OBJECT(p) FROM Order o, IN(o.products) AS p ORDER BY p.productId, p.product_type
SELECT OBJECT(p) FROM Order o, IN(o.products) AS p ORDER BY p.productId, p.product_type
SELECT DISTINCT OBJECT(p) FROM Order o, IN(o.products) AS p ORDER BY p.productId DESC, p.product_type DESC
SELECT COUNT(p) FROM Order o, IN (o.products) p
SELECT l.order FROM LineItem l
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT p) FROM Order o, Product p
SELECT DISTINCT l.order FROM LineItem l
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT p.product_type) FROM Order o, Product p
SELECT DISTINCT p.product_type FROM Product p
SELECT o.sampleLineItem FROM Order o
SELECT p.product_type FROM Product p
SELECT o.byteArray FROM Order o WHERE o.orderId = 1
SELECT DISTINCT OBJECT(p) FROM Product p WHERE p.product_type IN ('soda', 'candy')
SELECT MIN(o.customer.firstname) FROM Order o
SELECT DISTINCT OBJECT(p) FROM Product p WHERE p.product_type NOT IN ('soda', 'candy')
SELECT MIN(o.balance) FROM Order o
SELECT MIN(o.orderId) FROM Order o
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Order o WHERE o.billing_address = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Order o WHERE o.shipping_address = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Order o WHERE o.billing_address = o.shipping_address
SELECT DISTINCT OBJECT(p) FROM Product p, Order o WHERE o.billing_address MEMBER OF o.many_to_many AND o.one_to_one = p
SELECT DISTINCT OBJECT(p) FROM Product p, Order o WHERE o.shipping_address MEMBER OF o.many_to_many AND o.one_to_one = p
SELECT DISTINCT OBJECT(p) FROM Product p, Order o WHERE o.billing_address NOT MEMBER OF o.many_to_many AND o.one_to_one = p
SELECT DISTINCT OBJECT(p) FROM Product p, Order o WHERE p MEMBER OF o.products
SELECT DISTINCT OBJECT(p) FROM Product p, Order o WHERE o.shipping_address NOT MEMBER OF o.many_to_many AND o.one_to_one = p
SELECT DISTINCT o.one_to_one FROM Order o WHERE ?1 MEMBER OF o.products AND o.one_to_one IS NOT NULL
SELECT OBJECT(p) FROM Product p WHERE p.product_type LIKE 's%da' ESCAPE ?2
SELECT OBJECT(p) FROM Product p WHERE p.product_type LIKE ?1
SELECT OBJECT(p) FROM Product p WHERE ?1 IS NULL
SELECT DISTINCT o.one_to_one FROM Order o WHERE o.many_to_many IS EMPTY
SELECT OBJECT(p) FROM Product p WHERE ?1 IS NULL
SELECT DISTINCT o.one_to_one FROM Order o WHERE o.lineItems IS NOT EMPTY
SELECT OBJECT(p) FROM Product p WHERE p.productId = 1 AND p.product_type = 'soda'
SELECT DISTINCT o.one_to_one FROM Order o WHERE o.lineItems IS EMPTY

SELECT SUM(l.order.balance) FROM LineItem l
SELECT MAX(o.orderId) FROM Order o
SELECT DISTINCT p.product_type FROM Product p
SELECT MAX(o.customer.firstname) FROM Order o
SELECT OBJECT(p1) FROM Product p1, Product p2
SELECT AVG(o.balance) FROM Order o
SELECT AVG(DISTINCT o.balance) FROM Order o
SELECT o.balance FROM Order o ORDER BY o.balance DESC
SELECT p.product_type FROM Product p ORDER BY p.product_type
SELECT o.balance FROM Order o ORDER BY o.balance

SELECT SUM(l.order.orderId) FROM LineItem l
SELECT OBJECT(p) FROM Product p WHERE p.productId = 1 AND p.product_type = 'soda'
SELECT DISTINCT p.product_type FROM Product p ORDER BY p.product_type DESC

SELECT DISTINCT o.one_to_one FROM Order o WHERE o.one_to_one = ?1
SELECT p.productId FROM Product p WHERE CONCAT(p.product_type, 'soda') = CONCAT('soda', p.product_type)
SELECT p.productId FROM Product p WHERE CONCAT('so', 'da') = p.product_type
SELECT p.productId FROM Product p WHERE CONCAT(?1, 'da') = p.product_type
SELECT p.product_type FROM Product p
SELECT DISTINCT OBJECT(p) FROM Product p WHERE p.product_type LIKE 's\_oda' ESCAPE '\'

SELECT DISTINCT OBJECT(p) FROM Product p WHERE p.product_type LIKE '%oda'
SELECT DISTINCT OBJECT(p) FROM Product p WHERE p.one_to_one IS NULL

SELECT DISTINCT l.product FROM LineItem l WHERE l.product IS NULL

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT p) FROM Order o, IN (o.products) p
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT l.order) FROM LineItem l
